mapper.select: select m.*, u1.id as from_id,u1.regist_date AS from_regist_date,u1.name AS from_name,u1.email AS from_email,u1.iconUrl AS from_iconUrl,u1.password AS from_password,u1.salt AS from_salt,u1.is_locked AS from_is_locked, u2.id as to_id,u2.regist_date AS to_regist_date,u2.name AS to_name,u2.email AS to_email,u2.iconUrl AS to_iconUrl,u2.password AS to_password,u2.salt AS to_salt,u2.is_locked AS to_is_locked from message m LEFT JOIN user u1 on m.from_id=u1.id LEFT JOIN user u2 on m.to_id =u2.id where m.id = #{_parameter}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO message(from_id, to_id, content,send_date) VALUES (#{from.id},#{to.id},#{content},#{sendDate})
mapper.update: UPDATE message SET from_id = #{from.id},to_id = #{to.id},content = #{content},is_read = #{isRead},send_date=#{sendDate} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM message WHERE to_id = #{_parameter} and is_read = 0;
